Dear Sheffield City Council,
13. When Bed and mattress is approved as part of support plan during CP meeting, who provides support to buy the Mattress? Support worker or Social Work?
13b. In last 2 years how many times has a social worker taken on the responsibility and how many times has a support worker done it?
14. How many social workers do you have in Sheffield children social services
15. How many support workers do you have in Sheffield social services department
16. How many cases where Sheffield social services have removed children from SAFE parents or victims of DV back to perpetrator , child abusers or Foster care and children have continually been abused, harmed or killed in the last 5 years.
Of these how many are black white and asian
17. Was any action taken against Social workers or Manager who approved that action? If so what? What measures are put in place to ensure no harm comes to children in future, especially if Social services Sheffield placed children in care of abusers/ perpetrator or Foster care
Of these how many are white. Black and Asian families who suffered
18. How many families have complained about conduct of professionals and Sheffield social services in past 5 years?
Yours faithfully,
Mrs Parkin

Dear Sheffield City Council,
I made FOI  that's long over due , in September 23 and Oct 23
Can I kindly request for a response as yoy have a legal obligation to respond or send me reasons why you don't want to respond and what action I need to take if you continue to ignore me
Yours faithfully,
Mrs Parkin

Dear Mrs Parkin,
Thank you for your recent request for an internal review relating to
Social Services Budget and more which we received on 18/11/2023. We are
sorry to hear that you are not happy with your response.
This has now been logged and will be carried out by a member of the team.
The Freedom of Information Code of Practice states that we should aim to
your request for internal review within 20 working days, by 18/12/2023.
Please do not hesitate to contact us at the email address below if you
have any queries.
Please note that the Code of Practice does allow us to extend this
deadline by an additional 20 days in some situations. If we need more time
to complete the internal review, we will contact you to inform you of
this.
If you have any queries in the meantime, please contact us at the email
address below.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
